title: YearEnd
content:
Your year-end donation is vital to help us finish 2019 strong!

Please give generously to offer safe refuge and a warm welcome with a hot meal, shower, clean clothes and good night's rest to people in our community.

The life-restoring care you provide can change a man or woman's life forever through Portland Rescue Missions recovery programs!

Give today, and your donation can be matched, up to $10,000!
